content: I'm looking for some gift ideas for my sister's birthday, which is coming up soon. I got her a silver necklace last week, but I want to get her something else to go with it. Do you have any suggestions? By the way, I was just at a charity event today collecting donations for homeless people, and I ended up donating 10 shirts, 5 pairs of jeans, and some toiletries, as well as buying some additional items like socks and underwear to donate.
